text: Nils Wahlbom (October 28, 1886 – October 24, 1937) was a Swedish film actor. He appeared in around forty films including The Women Around Larsson (1934).Larsson & Marklund p.127 ==Selected filmography== * The Women Around Larsson (1934) * Kungen kommer (1936) * Our Boy (1936) * South of the Highway (1936) * Thunder and Lightning (1938) == References == == Bibliography == * Larsson, Mariah & Marklund, Anders. Swedish Film: An Introduction and Reader. Nordic Academic Press, 2010. == External links == * Category:1886 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Swedish male film actors Category:Swedish male silent film actors Category:People from Stockholm Category:20th-century Swedish male actors
title: Nils Wahlbom
